sentences.english: Another painful affliction was boils, big and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 另一个折磨我的病痛是疖子，又大又频繁。

sentences.english: Joni has written many books about pain and suffering.
sentences.chinese: 乔妮写了许多关病痛和苦难的书。

sentences.english: It has braced me up from the suffering of ailments, turning what is cowardly in me into courage.
sentences.chinese: 它使我从病痛中振作，怯弱生勇，改造我的性格。

sentences.english: This medicine will give you quick relief.
sentences.chinese: 这种药将快速解除你的病痛。

sentences.english: In particular, chronic pain can lead to grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 特别是慢性的病痛会导致情绪暴躁。

sentences.english: Overcoming his handicaps, Mao exuded an extraordinary willpower and determination.
sentences.chinese: 克服着病痛的毛散发出强大的决心和意志力。

sentences.english: Work is the grand cure of all the maladies and miseries that ever beset mankind.
sentences.chinese: 工作是医治人间一切病痛和疾苦的万应良药。

sentences.english: What agony was this! And the man seemed resolved to protract it.
sentences.chinese: 那是什么病痛呀？这人似乎决意吞吞吐吐。

sentences.english: doctors used to increase drug dosages to control their patients’ pain。
sentences.chinese: 医生过去常常增加药物剂量来控制病人的病痛。

sentences.english: Illness had 9)decluttered their lives, he told me.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我，病痛“整理”了他们的生活。

sentences.english: Sickness forces me to stop my exercise program?
sentences.chinese: 病痛强迫我暂停运动计划吗？

sentences.english: The old lady is never free from paining.
sentences.chinese: 这位老太太连续病痛缠身。

sentences.english: Zheng Jianong, a bulldozer driver, has been suffering from illness for years and his wife leaves him.
sentences.chinese: 推土车司机郑加农因常年受病痛所困，妻子离他而去。

sentences.english: A thousand ills the aged world surround.
sentences.chinese: 老年的世界千种病痛缠扰。

sentences.english: A sickness--weak old age--distress and death?
sentences.chinese: 你是否遇上了衰老病痛和死亡的阴云？

sentences.english: Focuses on outcomes such as physical fatigue, aches and pains , and health complaints.
sentences.chinese: 关注员工的身体疲劳，各种病痛以及对健康的抱怨等。

definition: to fall ill/to contract a disease
